original_title: A High Price for Ginger Beer
overview: 17-year-old Clarice Tovey grapples with guilt when an inquest is held into the death of her baby nephew who was under her watch when he tragically drowned. As each testimony is read, Clarice must learn to accept the past and let go of the constant 'what if's'. This is a story of faith, redemption, and sisterhood at its heart.
title: A High Price for Ginger Beer
